org.cloudbus.cloudsim
Class DatacenterBroker

java.lang.Object
  org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.SimEntity
      org.cloudbus.cloudsim.DatacenterBroker
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable
public class DatacenterBroker
extends SimEntity

DatacentreBroker represents a broker acting on behalf of a user. It hides VM management, as vm creation, sumbission of cloudlets to this VMs and destruction of VMs.

Since:
CloudSim Toolkit 1.0
Author:
Rodrigo N. Calheiros, Anton Beloglazov

shutdownEntity

public void shutdownEntity()
Description copied from class: SimEntity
This method is invoked by the Simulation before the simulation finishes. If you want to save data in log files this is the method in which the corresponding code would be placed.

Specified by:
